MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:05pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55pm on 18th November
